This is what to do:
Open the img-file with Daemon Tools > Mount it > the NHL 08 autorun menu will pop up > chose 'install' > use the cdkey from the .txt file > after installation is complete explore the mounted img-file with daemon tools > copy the file from the Fairlight folder > paste it in the folder where installed  the game (for example D:/EA Sports/NHL 08) replacing the old "nhl2008"-file
